13236.name: East Gordian Way
description: East Gordian Way extends north and east from here.  To the
northeast, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings
line the street.

13268.name: Beneath the Guard Towers
description: The area beneath the guard towers is shaded by the bridge overhead.
The street extends southeast and southwest from here, leading to other
parts of the city.

13218.name: Intersection of West Gordian Way & Valerian St.

13243.name: East Gordian Way

the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line the
street.

13261.name: Valerian Street
description: Valerian Street extends east and west along the centerline of the
city.  To the west, you can see the center of the city, while the city
walls lie to the east.

13201.name: Upward Sloping Path
description: The swampy beach can still be seen to the east, a fair distance
down the hill.  The smell of the swamp is faded - barely perceptible -
and is being replaced by the crisp air prevalent at higher elevations.
The city to the southwest is in view, but one would need to approach
more closely to determine details.

southwest, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings
line the street.

13244.name: East Gordian Way

13228.name: Beneath the West Guard Tower
description: The western guard tower looms overhead, a set of stairs leading
into it.  The beginning of West Gordian Way is south of here, while
the path to the city gates lies to the east.

13217.name: West Gordian Way
description: West Gordian Way extends north and south from here.  To the west,
the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line the
street.

13226.name: West Gordian Way
description: West Gordian Way extends north and west from here.  To the
northwest, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings
line the street.

13221.name: West Gordian Way
description: West Gordian Way extends east and south from here.  To the north
and west, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line
the street.

13214.name: Intersection of West & South Gordian Way

13269.name: Inside the Gates of Rivenshield
description: The massive city gates loom to the north.  The streets of the city,
bustling with life, extend southward and split off in a fork there.
Above you, you can see a bridge between two guard towers which
overlooks the gates.

13249.name: Intersection of South & East Gordian Way

13267.name: West Gordian Way
description: West Gordian Way extends north and south from here.  To the west,
the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line the
street.

13210.name: South Gordian Way
description: South Gordian Way extends north and east from here.  To the south
and west, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line
the street.

13234.name: Beneath the East Guard Tower
description: The eastern guard tower looms overhead, a set of stairs leading
into it.  The beginning of East Gordian Way is south of here, while
the path to the city gates lies to the west.

13266.name: Valerian Street
description: Valerian Street extends east and west along the centerline of the
city.  To the east, you can see the center of the city, while the city
walls lie to the west.

13255.name: South Gordian Way
description: South Gordian Way extends north and west from here.  To the south
and east, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line
the street.

13205.name: Intersection of South Gordian Way & Faramond St.

13225.name: West Gordian Way
description: West Gordian Way extends east and south from here.  To the north
and west, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line
the street.

13203.name: On the Road to Rivenshield
description: The dirt path gradually turns into a worn path of granite here,
marked on either edge by small mounds of stone.  The road curves to
the southwest, leading to the now clearly-visible city gates.  To the
east, the path leads down the mountainside and towards the swamps of
Haon Dor.

13211.name: South Gordian Way
description: South Gordian Way extends west and south from here.  To the
southwest, the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings
line the street.

13200.name: Upward Sloping Path
description: The swampy beach lies to the east of here.  The fetid air of the
swamp is still apparent in this area, but seems to clear slightly as
one gets farther from the mire.  To the west, a path winds through the
hills; in the distance, city walls can be clearly seen.

13204.name: Before the Gates of Rivenshield
description: The gates of Rivenshield tower above you, rising at least thirty
feet from the ground.  The hewn granite walls of the city extend to
the east and west before turning southward.  To the northeast, the
granite road leads away from the city, while the road can be seen to
continue southward.
Massive iron gates loom south of here.

13262.name: Intersection of Faramond St. & Valerian St.

the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line the

13256.name: South Gordian Way

13241.name: East Gordian Way

13246.name: East Gordian Way
description: East Gordian Way extends north and south from here.  To the east,
the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line the
street.

13202.name: Top of the Path
description: This is the top of the path.  To the east, the swamp can be seen in
its entirety.  Farther to the east the city of Westbridge can barely
be seen, obscured by mist from the swamp.  To the south, the walls of
Rivenshield can easily be seen, hewn from the stone of the mountain
peak.  The path extends from east to west from here.

13240.name: East Gordian Way
description: East Gordian Way extends east and west from here.  To the north,
the tall walls of the city can be seen, while buildings line the
street.

13200.name: a stalwart dwarven guard~
description:
This guard is short, yet sturdy.  His beard is braided in two parts
and held in place by a sash across his torso - presumably to keep it
out of his way when he must fight an intruder.
13200.room_name: The stalwart dwarven guard is here, watching the gates for signs of intruders.

13201.name: Hulmuntiar~
subroutines:

F par ABCDEFGHIJK
